attributes.action: To vaccinate teachers before any sort of return to school.
attributes.additional_details: This is crucial to ensure the safety of everyone as a teenager myself I hate to think that I may be returning to school in an unsafe environment therefore I think teachers should be vaccinated as I didn't want to be in a lock-down just to go back into one again especially with all the hardships that people have been through. So please if possible vaccinate teachers before the return to school. They should be categorised as high-risk.
attributes.background: I think that the government should be vaccinating teachers before the return to school also if possible students. I think they should to make sure that teachers and everyone are safe especially for this apparent return to school.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Prioritise teachers, school and childcare staff for Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316

Don’t re-open schools until all staff have been vaccinated: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572419
